movies.title: Silver Spoon
movies.plot: Yuugo, who grew up in the city, finds himself in an unfamiliar environment at Ooejo Agricultural High School, surrounded by nature and animals. Yuugo is also the only one who doesn't know what type of career he wants to pursue. He goes through struggles everyday, but he begins to grow as a person.
movies.simplePlot: Yuugo, who grew up in the city, finds himself in an unfamiliar environment at Ooejo Agricultural High School, surrounded by nature and animals. Yuugo is also the only one who doesn't know ...

biography.bio: Kento Nakajima is an actor, known for Silver Spoon (2014), Gekijouban Bad Boys J: Saigo ni mamorumono (2013) and Kazoku no uta (2012).
biography.name: Kento Nakajima

biography.bio: Alice Hirose is an actress, known for Silver Spoon (2014), Môsô kanojo (2015) and L (2016).
biography.name: Alice Hirose

biography.bio: Tomohiro Ichikawa is an actor, known for Silver Spoon (2014), Shi to kanojo to boku (2012) and Misaki Number One (2011).
biography.name: Tomohiro Ichikawa

biography.bio: Haru Kuroki was born on March 14, 1990 in Osaka, Japan. She is an actress, known for Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012), La maison au toit rouge (2014) and A Bride for Rip Van Winkle (2016).
biography.name: Haru Kuroki

biography.bio: Shô Aikawa was born on May 24, 1961 in Kagoshima, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Gozu (2003), Dead or Alive (1999) and Zebraman (2004).
biography.name: Shô Aikawa

biography.bio: Kazue Fukiishi was born on September 28, 1982 in Osaka, Japan. She is an actress, known for 13 assassins (2010), Noriko's Dinner Table (2005) and One Missed Call (2003). She has been married to Masaharu Fukuyama since September 28, 2015.
biography.name: Kazue Fukiishi

biography.bio: Mitsuru Fukikoshi was born on February 17, 1965 in Aomori, Japan. He is an actor, known for Le samouraï du crépuscule (2002), Cold Fish (2010) and Samurai Fiction (1998). He was previously married to Leona Hirota.
biography.name: Mitsuru Fukikoshi

biography.bio: Renji Ishibashi was born on August 9, 1941 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Audition (1999), Bird People in China (1998) and Dead or Alive (1999).
biography.name: Renji Ishibashi

biography.bio: Yutaka Mishima is an actor, known for Silence (2016), Shutter (2008) and Tokyo Gore Police (2008).
biography.name: Yutaka Mishima

biography.bio: Shidô Nakamura was born on September 14, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan as Mikihiko Ogawa. He is an actor and director, known for Letters from Iwo Jima (2006), Red Cliff (2008) and Fearless (2006). He was previously married to Yûko Takeuchi.
biography.name: Shidô Nakamura

biography.bio: Naomi Nishida was born on February 16, 1972 in Hiroshima, Japan. She is an actress, known for Godzilla 2000 (1999), The Happiness of the Katakuris (2001) and Nabbie no koi (1999).
biography.name: Naomi Nishida

biography.bio: Riki Takeuchi was born on January 4, 1964 in Oita, Japan as Chikara Takeuchi. He is an actor and producer, known for Dead or Alive (1999), Last Life in the Universe (2003) and Big Man Japan (2007).
biography.name: Riki Takeuchi

biography.bio: Ryûhei Ueshima was born on January 20, 1961 in Kobe, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ueshima jên (2009), Hana (2006) and Kaibutsu-kun: Episode 0 (2011).
biography.name: Ryûhei Ueshima
